document.full_text: tennessee valley authority officials said the 3,200-megawatt browns ferry nuclear station in alabama will likely remain shut another two to three weeks while tva's high-voltage transmission grid is repaired to allow power to flow from the plant to customers.
document.title: tva says alabama nuclear units shut for 2-3 weeks
lines_and_colors: tennessee valley authority officials said the 3,200-megawatt browns ferry nuclear station in alabama will likely remain shut another two to three weeks while tva's high-voltage transmission grid is repaired to allow power to flow from the plant to customers.
